blogPost.excerpt: Ship faster and improve team satisfaction with engineering analytics powered by your Github data. -- → Visualize the entire delivery process from commit to deploy → Highlight bottlenecks like code review → Spot issues like feature delays and team burnout.
blogPost.body: Ship faster and improve team satisfaction with engineering analytics powered by your Github data. -- → Visualize the entire delivery process from commit to deploy → Highlight bottlenecks like code review → Spot issues like feature delays and team burnout.
blogPost.title: Haystack - Ship faster and improve dev happiness
blogPost.author: Gustaf Alströmer

localize.description: 借助由您的Github数据提供支持的工程分析，加快发货速度并提高团队满意度。--→可视化整个交付过程，从提交到部署，→突出瓶颈(如代码审查)，→发现问题(如功能延迟和团队倦怠)。
localize.tagline: 加快发货速度，提高开发人员幸福感

localize.description: 藉助由您的Github數據提供支持的工程分析，加快發貨速度並提高團隊滿意度。--→可視化整個交付過程，從提交到部署，→突出瓶頸(如代碼審查)，→發現問題(如功能延遲和團隊倦怠)。
localize.tagline: 加快發貨速度，提高開發人員幸福感
